mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, m_password, m_name, m_email, m_phone) values(#{m_id},#{m_password},#{m_name},#{m_email}, #{m_phone})
mapper.select: select * from member where m_id=#{m_id} and m_password=#{m_password}
mapper.update: update member set m_name=#{m_name}, m_email=#{m_email}, m_phone=#{m_phone} where m_number=#{m_number}
mapper.select: select m_id from member where m_id=#{m_id}
